com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.elements

Interface ViewElementBuilder<T extends ViewElement>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckboxFormElementBuilder, ConversionServiceViewElementBuilder, DateFormElementBuilder, FieldsetViewElementBuilder, FormElementBuilderSupport, HiddenFormElementBuilder, SelectFormElementBuilder, TextboxFormElementBuilder, ViewElementBuilderSupport

    public interface ViewElementBuilder<T extends ViewElement>
    Base interface to create a single ViewElement instance.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T createViewElement(ViewElementBuilderContext builderContext)
      Builds the actual element.
      void setMessageCodeResolver(EntityMessageCodeResolver messageCodeResolver)
      The resolver that should be used for all message codes once the view element is being created.

    • Method Detail

      • setMessageCodeResolver

        void setMessageCodeResolver(EntityMessageCodeResolver messageCodeResolver)
        The resolver that should be used for all message codes once the view element is being created.
        Parameters:
        messageCodeResolver - instance, can be null if codes should not be resolved.

      • createViewElement

        T createViewElement(ViewElementBuilderContext builderContext)
        Builds the actual element. This will resolve all configured messages - if any.
        Parameters:
        builderContext - that provides access to other builders
        Returns:
        instance to render the element.
